text: Anita Gradin (12 August 1933 – 23 May 2022) was a Swedish politician. She was born in Hörnefors, Sweden. She was a member of the Riksdag from 1969 until 1992. She later was a member of the European Commission from 1995 until 1999. Gradin was president of Socialists International Women and worked against the human trafficking of women. Gradin died on 23 May 2022, aged 89.Sveriges första EU-kommissionär har dött ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Swedish politicians
title: Anita Gradin
